data.name: Uncharted Space - project 3062
data.detailed_description:
We are planning to make a free and open strategy game, which has a rich gameplay and challenging stages.
To achieve this, we have designed the game mechanics in such a way that the game is easy to expand. We have also spared no effort to make the game more friendly to gamers who want to customize their own games and mod makers alike.

In the part we have already made, in the strategy section, you can:
Achieve different ways of development through selecting and building various space stations. For example, you can obtain resources only through space exploration, rather than war; you can also achieve this through trades with other colonies; meanwhile, you can protect yourself through diplomatic method; you can, of course, get rich by warring with others, conquering other planets and plundering their resources with your carefully built army.

In the tactic section, you can organize different types of battleships into different groups and create different tactic teams through their unique divisions of work. Then you can set your battle formation to minimize the loses in a battle. Yes, every one of your ship counts. So it is best that you don’t lose any of them. To achieve this, careful tactic planning and skillful micro management are both crucial.
data.about_the_game:
We are planning to make a free and open strategy game, which has a rich gameplay and challenging stages.
To achieve this, we have designed the game mechanics in such a way that the game is easy to expand. We have also spared no effort to make the game more friendly to gamers who want to customize their own games and mod makers alike.

data.short_description: In this game, you are a leader, leading a force of army to fight other forces in the deep spaces. You will plunder their resources, build your homelands, explore and expand, managing your army both strategically and tactically. This will be a saga written with blood and fire.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel core i3 540
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 370X
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX580
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible sound card
